alert.note: Alert for Ozark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Ozark County through 630 PM CDT... At 600 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Price Place to near Bakersfield. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bull Shoals Lake... Norfork Lake... Gainesville... Bakersfield... Pontiac... Sundown... Hardenville... Tecumseh... Isabella... Udall... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
